list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fixed receptacle into which a person may urinate or defecate, typically consisting of a large bowl connected to a system for flushing away the waste into a sewer or septic tank.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her toilet completed, she finally went back downstairs

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: assist or supervise (someone, especially an infant or invalid) in using a toilet.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: patients were fed and toileted every four hours
